actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources (without written report).

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 95-287.
Placed on calendar in Senate under Measures Cleared to be Considered by Unanimous Consent.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: An original resolution reported authorizing supplemental expenditures.

summary.text: Amends Senate Resolution 78 (Expenditures by Senate committees) to increase to $265,000 the total amount which may be expended by the Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources for hearings and investigations, and to increase to $32,000 the amount which may be used for the procurement of consultants.

titles.title: An original resolution reported authorizing supplemental expenditures.
